author: azeez
msg: There are 3 interfaces in the Axis2 clustering implementation.
1. ClusterManager
2. ContextManager
3. ConfigurationManager
Now I realize that these names are wrong. So we need to;
1. s/ClusterManager/NodeInitializer
2. s/ContextManager/StateReplicationManager
3. s/ConfigurationManager/NodeManager
ClusterManagement actually refers to management of an entire cluster,
which again can constitute several groups.
We can safely rename these interfaces since there is only a
single implementation at the moment.
We will also need to change the cluster config section in the axis2.xml
file. This will simply be changes to the element tag names. The
latest axis2.xml cluster configuration is very much different to that
shipped with axis2 1.4.1 since I've introduced several parameters to
give more cluster parameter configuration control to the user.
